summary: @a-collection-of-atoms​ asks: Allura and the Traveler First, I don’t know how people do that “quote” thingy for their ask...
body:
@a-collection-of-atoms​ asks: Allura and the Traveler

First, I don’t know how people do that “quote” thingy for their ask replies. Nor tag anyone in an “ask” reply.

Secondly, I will absolutely do this! Nothing but the best for Lady Allura and the Traveler formerly known as “Artagan”. (At least, that’s the theory.)

Also, obvious spoiler warnings.

Arcanist Allura Vysoren

First impression

A very reasonable authority figure and such a close friend of Lady Kima.

Impression now

Essentially the Team Mom of Vox Machina’s extended family of fools. Their closest companion (and that does include Gilmore) and a woman of wisdom. Also, a woman who definitely deserved her happy ending with her now-wife Kima.

Favorite moment

Many to choose from, but I’d have to go with “The Deceiver’s Stand” and her dispelling of Raishan’s Greater Invisibility spell. Which leads to her giving Keyleth motivation to stay focused on the battle ahead, which then leads to the ultimate poetic justice for the Diseased Deceiver.

If not that, then managing to grab onto Death from Above and lift Kima up as the two are rescued by Vex.

Idea for a story

If I had the confidence, I’d write a fic about Allie and Kima reconnecting during the times where Vox Machina was not around. Pretty much from the moment Kima is brought to Whitestone in “Those Who Walk Away…” and onward. That or a possible fic about their actual wedding and how relieved they were that Vox Machina wasn’t there to create chaos lol

Unpopular opinion

Not sure any opinion about her is “unpopular”, but the possible closest I would have is that she still has some lingering affection for a certain sorcerer and feels sad that any chance they would’ve had at reconciliation was brutally cut short by the Conclave’s attack on Draconia. Just because she’s happy with Kima does not mean she doesn’t miss him.

Favorite relationship

Kimallura, duh! A second would be the more matronly relationship she has with Vox Machina, but most of all with Keyleth. Whenever the Voice felt lost and unsure and Allura was around, she was there to steady the fledgling leader-in-training.

As for the rest of Vox Machina, each of them represent a part of her past and present: Vax’s mischievousness, Vex’s cleverness, Percy’s intelligence, Keyleth’s morality, Grog’s courage, Scanlan’s confidence, and Pike’s kindness. Hell, she even mentioned how they reminded her of herself in her time as an adventurer.

Favorite headcanon

In addition to her obvious platonic and familial affection for Vox Machina,  I wouldn’t be surprised if she even felt affection for Keyleth in a similar manner to her feelings for Kima but decided to downplay it immensely because she knew the druid’s feelings for Vax were strong and she didn’t want to make things more awkward. Hell, I believe that on their off days post-campaign, the three of them often get together for a drink or dinner and reminisce about the early days which would include the argument in the Underdark between Kiki and Kima that was later defused a whole episode after the fact. And that even Kima and Allura had disagreements on that level before becoming romantically involved in their adventuring days. Pretty much a Take That! to every single hater who to this very day continue to use that argument as an example to justify their hate.

Seriously, to those who continue to do that, fuck you.

The Traveler

First impression

Jester’s imaginary friend.

Impression now

Too mysterious to still get a good read on him.

Favorite moment

His response to Jester’s “Why didn’t you come?” upon the group’s return to Zadash after Shady Creek Run.

Idea for a story

Too soon to tell yet.

Unpopular opinion

He’s totally manipulating Jester. Whether it’s for good or bad, who can say?

Favorite relationship

Does it even need mentioning?

Favorite headcanon

Again, isn’t it obvious?

blog.name: a-heist-of-words
blog.title: Before everything, there were stories.
blog.description: Brianda. She/Her pronouns. It's a mess but I hope you like it. Feel free to leave a message!

summary: “My champion...”  I recently rediscovered my passion for colored pencils and I have been on a Critical Role binge lately, so...
caption:
“My champion…”

I recently rediscovered my passion for colored pencils and I have been on a Critical Role binge lately, so here’s one of my favorite scenes from the first campaign.

The Raven Queen is so chilling but so awesome and I loved drawing her. I kinda added in Vax as an afterthought so that’s why he lacks detail (also he was probably not clothed since he had to dive into a pool of blood to actually get to the Queen so… yeah).

tags: i'm planning on spending the hiatus rewatching and i hope to have more detailed and developed thoughts on widojest after
and on lots of other things
i may have to keep some paper on hand during my rewatch...
summary: i don't ship anything yet but like.... im having Soft Feelings about the fact that caleb was the first person jester openly,...
question: i don't ship anything yet but like.... im having Soft Feelings about the fact that caleb was the first person jester openly, without any real subterfuge or vagueness, acknowledged her crush on fjord to. tbf he called her out (kindly) but even so. like i find it really interesting that she wanted nott and beau for advice but held back, but was pretty candid with caleb who she didnt (and probably wouldn't have) sought out for that topic
answer:
Jester and Caleb’s relationship is really interesting to me. Despite the fact that I think Beau is the M9 member after Nott that he’s closest to at the moment, Jester is definitely the M9 member he warmed up to the quickest. And I think that colors all of their interactions with each other. I’m not sure if Jester knows that Caleb can see through some of her more performative happiness, but I think on some level she senses that she can show him the softer and sadder and more serious parts of herself without shocking him. Whereas her relationship with Nott is more playful. And I think that she knows he’ll understand and respect that sadness, in a way that she’s maybe scared other people won’t, because it’s not who she’s “supposed” to be. (tangent: all of the people who suggest jester is doesn’t “actually” care about fjord because she idealizes him are overlooking the fact that fjord also idealizes jester regarding her seeming ability to remain happy all the time. they both care about each other and they both idealize each other. *gets down from soap box*)

It makes me so sad that Caleb thinks that Jester would react the worst to knowing about his past, because I think that of the group Jester would be the most understanding. I think Fjord would be generally supportive, and I think Cad would be somewhat measured. But Jester? I think she would just be incredibly sad for him, and gentle with him. And I think she’d be able to say what Beau can’t quite verbalize: “we love you no matter what.” (But of course–I’m pretty sure Caleb would like to avoid being even a tangential source of sadness for Jester at all costs! Fuck but do I love Liam and Laura’s in-character dynamics so much)

I don’t necessarily ship Widojest (yet) either–largely because I have trouble shipping anyone with Caleb at the moment. And I don’t necessarily think it will happen. But if it did, or even if Caleb develops a slight crush on her, it would make so much sense and I think could be really beautiful. (Though I must admit it’s hard to stop thinking of Liam and Laura as twinnies, despite the fact that I only watched C1 after starting this campaign.)

It makes me so sad that Caleb thinks that Jester would react the worst to knowing about his past, because I think that of the group Jester would be the most understanding. I think Fjord would be generally supportive, and I think Cad would be somewhat measured. But Jester? I think she would just be incredibly sad for him, and gentle with him. And I think she’d be able to say what Beau can’t quite verbalize: “we love you no matter what.” (But of course–I’m pretty sure Caleb would like to avoid being even a tangential source of sadness for Jester at all costs! Fuck but do I love Liam and Laura’s in-character dynamics so much)

I don’t necessarily ship Widojest (yet) either–largely because I have trouble shipping anyone with Caleb at the moment. And I don’t necessarily think it will happen. But if it did, or even if Caleb develops a slight crush on her, it would make so much sense and I think could be really beautiful. (Though I must admit it’s hard to stop thinking of Liam and Laura as twinnies, despite the fact that I only watched C1 after starting this campaign.)

tags: oh god now I actually have to finish that chapter
title: Fic Announcement!
body:
I realized that the one-year anniversary of That Old Sweet Feeling is on December 12th, and it just so happens that I’m working on another longfic, so I figured hey, why not start posting that on December 12th of this year?

So, you can look forward to the first chapter of Green and Grey, a modern-human Widofjord AU with the requisite angst, found family, and full cast that you’ve come to expect from my longfics, on December 12th!

(Relatedly, I had thought that maybe I’d write the whole thing before I started posting it. This is not proving feasible. So don’t expect regular updates right away, unfortunately, especially as I’ll be going into my last semester of grad school. But get hyped, because it’s going to be a long boi.)

summary: That one thing but for Critical Role characters (Please send me an Ask about it, characters from both campaigns are allowed)
title: That one thing but for Critical Role characters (Please send me an Ask about it, characters from both campaigns are allowed)
body:
I keep seeing people do these, and I would really like to share my thoughts. Of course, I know most don’t really pay much attention to me or what I think. But… might as well try.

And I will attempt to be as forthright and honest as possible. And hopefully not biased.

  • First impression
  • Impression now
  • Favorite moment
  • Idea for a story
  • Unpopular opinion
  • Favorite relationship
  • Favorite headcanon
